title: 'Everybody in the organization was miserable': Inside the Nuggets' shocking dual firings
description: With less than a week left in the regular season, Denver fired its head coach and GM, ending a yearslong cold war, and risking the NBA's most precious commodity: the prime of three-time NBA MVP Nikola Jokic.
author: Tim MacMahon and Ramona Shelburne

title: Rose remains atop bunched Masters leaderboard
description: Justin Rose is still in the lead at the Masters. He suddenly has a lot of all-star company around him.

title: Rose still sets Masters pace as McIlroy roars back
description: Justin Rose leads the Masters as he continues his quest for a maiden victory at the age of 44, while Rory McIlroy recovers to move two shots behind.

title: Why Salah turned down 'Â£500m Saudi move' for Liverpool stay
description: BBC Sport senior football correspondent Sami Mokbel lifts the lid on why Mohamed Salah decided to stay at Liverpool despite interest from Saudi Arabia.

title: McIlroy proud of Masters 'reset' after boosting Grand Slam push
description: Rory McIlroy praised his own major resilience and the support of sports psychologist Bob Rotella after charging back into contention for the career Grand Slam at The Masters.

title: Rose searches for major 'secret recipe' and 'gift' Masters glory
description: Justin Rose plans to draw on recent experiences of contending in majors as he chases a victory at The Masters that would feel "a gift" at this stage of his career.

title: Golden State Warriors jersey history - No. 10 - Mike Dunleavy (2002-07)
description: During his time suiting up for the Warriors, Dunleavy wore only jersey Nos. 10 and 34 and put up 10.6 points, 4.7 rebounds, and 2.5 assists per game.

title: Brooklyn Nets jersey history No. 13 - John Roche (1971-74)
description: During his time suiting up for the Nets, Roche wore only jersey No. 13 and put up 13.1 points, 1.8 rebounds, and 3.9 assists per game.
